detail_desc: Top in a cotton weave with short cap sleeves and a gathered, elasticated neckline.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with narrow hems.

Straight-cut shirt in a stripe-print weave with block-coloured sections and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long, wide sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Blouse in a patterned, lightly crêped viscose weave with a round neckline and small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a small opening with ties at the hems and gathers at the shoulders.
Vest top in soft slub jersey made from a cotton blend with a racer back and rounded hem.

Trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and flap leg and back pockets with concealed press-studs. Concealed drawstring at the hems. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined jacket in woven fabric with a hood, stand-up collar with a drawstring, zip down the front, welt side pockets and one inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in lace with ties at the sides. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Sleeveless playsuit in patterned viscose jersey with narrow, braided shoulder straps, braided trims and a double layer at the top.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the top, lace trims around the neckline and armholes and press-studs at the crotch.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and concealed buttons at the front.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Decorative bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.9 cm.
Three-strand metal necklace with pendants.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Linen scarf with raw edges and short fringe trims on the short sides.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit bodice, motif on the front, gathered seam at the hips and gently flared, patterned skirt.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Fitted vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey.
Sun hat in dobby-weave organic cotton with broderie anglaise and ties under the chin. Width of brim 5 cm. Lined.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a halterneck with ties at the back of the neck and a flounce at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a frilled seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a decorative, sewn-on bow at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in an organic cotton weave with two chest pockets, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a turtle neck and long, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and decorative buttons.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a tulle outer layer and a velour bow at the top. Opening with a faceted button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Non-wired nursing bras in soft microfibre with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Fitted, lightweight jacket in nylon with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. Small stand-up collar that can be folded in and secured with a press-stud to form a V-neck. Press-studs down the front and side pockets. The jacket is easy to pack into the storage bag it is supplied with. Size of storage bag: 10x22 cm.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit cotton top and patterned mesh skirt. Motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined skirt.
Dress in soft jersey with a tulle skirt, glitter print on the front and short sleeves. Frilled, gathered seam at the waist and a lined skirt decorated with reversible sequins.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Trainers in mesh with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Soft jersey jacket with a button at the front, notch lapels and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Jacket in soft pile with a hood with sewn-on ears, a zip down the front and side pockets in the shape of paws. Unlined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.
Short dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Large scarf in a soft, airy weave with fringes on the short sides.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.5 cm.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with reflective details and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap patch pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Suit trousers woven in a stretch wool blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with concealed press-studs at the back. Seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in soft viscose jersey.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in smocked cotton jersey with short sleeves. Small, overlocked frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and wide, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Flared style with a double-layered, low-cut skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in textured-knit premium cotton. Round neck with a ribbed trim and a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved wrapover top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elasticated seam at the waist and sewn-in tie at the side.
Calf-length skirt in soft sweatshirt fabric with concealed elastication at the waist and a flare to the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in big hole mesh and gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Straight style in a relaxed fit.
Soft glasses case with an opening on one short side. Size 8x17 cm.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Recycled polyester lining and filling. The polyester content of the jacket’s outer layer is partly recycled.
